name: mapInputContext
signature: { <R0, R>(f: (env0: Context<R0>) => Context<R>): <Out, In>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out, In, R0>; <Out, In, R, R0>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, f: (env0: Context<R0>) => Context<R>): Schedule<Out, In, R0>; }
description:
Transforms the required context of a schedule.
*Details This function modifies a schedule by mapping its required context (`R`) into
a new context (`R0`) using the provided function `f`. This is useful when you need to adapt a schedule to work with a different
dependency environment without changing its core logic.
documentation:
Transforms the required context of a schedule.
*Details**

This function modifies a schedule by mapping its required context (`R`) into
a new context (`R0`) using the provided function `f`.

This is useful when you need to adapt a schedule to work with a different
dependency environment without changing its core logic.
